summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing obtaining a book by Alexa Lisa Randall for vacation reading. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, requesting a book for vacation reading.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Alexa Lisa Randall
persons.context: Alexa Lisa Randall is mentioned as the author of a book that Epstein wants to read.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is requesting a book by Alexa Lisa Randall.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
